Dialogue Text: I knew I was right to trust you all along!
Indeed, this is the place I've been looking for.
Hm... but my brother doesn't seem to be anywhere here. Maybe I've mistaken?
That's strange... maybe he might've gone to a much brighter area. And who knows if you may cross paths with him during your journey?
Perhaps our fates might really be intertwined. I met you in such a vast place after all! Here, take this. It's the least I can do to thank you.
